name: reSYNC
description:
Rewind the motion of signals in order to connect wires and create light For two or more wires to connect, their signals must be synchronised first. Controls

Mouse (left): click and hold on a wire to rewind the signal

Mouse (right): click and hold on a wire to rewind the signal and the signals of connected wires

R: restart level

ESC: pause game

Credits

Ronnie Sallan: Game Design & Programming

Leo 'Awez' Chenevert: Art & Animation

Jake Archer: Sound Design & Music

Misc.

This game was made for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2. The theme was 'Rewind'.
